course.subject: HUMA
course.name: Logical Thinking in Ancient China
course.description: This course will identify the philosophical issues related to language and logic as reflected in Confucianism, Daoism, Neo-Mohism, the School of Name (Ming-chia) and Buddhism, and will provide an analytic and logical approach to the analysis of the issues. Topics include logical and linguistic issues in Confucianism, Daoism, Logical School, Neo-Mohism, and Buddhism.
